live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
55192.summary: Some customers in the Clearview Meadows area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55192.title: Nov 16 - Red Deer (Clearview Meadows) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
